title: Dovecot.io Mail Diagnostic Tool
hero_title: One-stop Diagnostics for Common Mail Issues
hero_desc: Enter a domain or hostname to quickly check MX, SPF, DKIM, DMARC, Port Connectivity, TLS/STARTTLS, DNSBL, PTR and more.
about_desc: Dovecot.io is an independent mail connectivity and deliverability diagnostics toolkit designed to help engineers quickly locate DNS configuration, TLS, port reachability, and reputation issues. It is not a mail hosting service, nor does it provide commercial mailboxes. With its open JSON APIs, it can be integrated as an internal health-check or self-hosted monitoring panel.
kv_abilities_val: MX / SPF / DKIM / DMARC, Port Connectivity, TLS/STARTTLS, DNSBL, PTR
kv_audience_val: Mail Administrators, DevOps Engineers, Deliverability Experts, SREs
kv_deploy_val: Frontend-Backend separation with static UI; backend provides /api/* JSON interfaces
kv_integrate_val: CI/CD health checks, scheduled inspections, alert integration
legal_desc: This site is not affiliated, associated, or endorsed by the Dovecot mail server project. "Dovecot.io" is an independent website providing general-purpose mail diagnostic tools and reports.
legal_note: This site is not affiliated with the Dovecot mail server project.
